The Lord has revealed many things to me concerning the manner in which the work should be carried forward in new fields, and has shown me that if a certain course were pursued, it would narrow the work and cause it to be marred. Perfect harmony can exist only through the abundant grace of 


                                      -395- 

Christ.--Letter 4, 1890, pp. 1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 9. (To "Dear Brethren Now Laboring as Missionaries in the Field of Africa, March, 1890.)
